title: Monday Mini: What's Up With Pandemic Sex Orgies?
itunes:title: Monday Mini: What's Up With Pandemic Sex Orgies?
description:
During the pandemic, there have been a spate of headlines about illegal sex parties being broken up. How much of this is sensationalized and how much of it was going on before lockdown? SMNTY investigates and everything continues to lead back to Sex and the City.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
